      • onClearContent

        public void onClearContent(boolean clearmaps)
        Used to remove the markers from the map in case of a zeroize action. Does not do so cleanly but does remove the markers and their associated data. Button state is not properly restored, but in a zeroize state, that's the least of the worries. Should cover the Red X in the R+B toolbar as it is a tool for both toolbars.
        Specified by:
        onClearContent in interface ClearContentRegistry.ClearContentListener
        Parameters:
        clearmaps - True to clear map source and cache data
